name: Blob Blast: REGEN
description:
Blob Blast: REGEN is an all-new Blob Blast game with totally new machanics:

  • Up+Down arrows to aim
  • Start with every turret unlocked
  • Each blob killed gives you one life
  • Every blob that makes it to the left of the screen damages you
  • You take damage equal to the blob damage displayed top-left
  • Blob damage starts at 1
  • Each blob that makes it to the left makes blob damage increase by 1
  • Blobs move at double-speed
  • Your turret will auto-shoot
  • Click to cycle turret

Purchase this game for only $2.00
